configdata.Program: CREATE PROCEDURE ResolveCurrency @_Currency NVARCHAR OUTPUT @_AccountID INTEGER AS BEGIN select avCompany.c_currency INTO @_Currency from t_account_ancestor aaCompany inner join t_av_internal avCompany on aaCompany.id_ancestor = avCompany.id_acc and getutcdate() between aaCompany.vt_start and aaCompany.vt_end where aaCompany.id_descendent = @_AccountID and aaCompany.num_generations = 1 END
